creator: info@dvholten.de
text:
after i saw cameron's commit 414115 to fix some arguments to a
System.arraycopy() i checked all other arraycopys for wrong parameters and found
two bugs, which are patched with the attached patch.

creator: info@dvholten.de
text:
Created attachment 18481
fix two wrong System.arraycopy-calls

bugfix for getPropertyNames in
o.a.b.ext.awt.image.renderable/AbstractRable.java
and
o.a.b.ext.awt.image.rendered.AbstractRed.java
